title: Super Galaxy Rumble Mute Button!!!!!
body:
Seriously, can we get a mute button for this skin? I'm not saying I hate a good Gurren Lagann spinoff skin, but this has to be the most annoying thing to lane against.

If you haven't seen this skin before (You should have) then you need to know that Rumble talks nearly every time he uses an ability. And it's quite loud and beeps a bit much at times. Even louder than the regular Rumble's laugh and warning noises. Knowing his abilities are spammable....he talks...a LOT.

Maybe it's just me, but it breaks my concentration at times and makes it hard to focus in the lane without getting annoyed or sounded out in my head by him.

So please, Riot, can you make a mute button for Super Galaxy Rumble like you made a button to listen to Sona's music? But for both teams?

replies.body: Super Galaxy Rumble + Tristana is the most obnoxious troll bot lane ever. So many quotes.
No that's all wrong. It's {{champion:45}} and Super Galaxy {{champion:68}}. :) (There's a chance Veigar will be spamming ctrl+1 or 2)

You can turn off the "Voice" of the champions in the Sound menu. It really doesnt bother me since i am usually screaming "THIS DRILL IS THE DRILL THAT WILL PIERCE THROUGH YOUR BUTT%^@$", But i hope i was able to help you in some way!! -- Caytheles The Support Main

P.S- Riot.. please make more Super Galaxy skins....
Yup, you can turn off the VO on the Sound menu. In addition, muting someone will turn off the VO of the champion.
You noticed me Q_Q Big fan.
